email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 25,000MT of Wheat from Buenos Aires to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for 15th to 20th November, and the initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per metric ton.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40.00 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and any additional charges?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, and there are no additional charges.

Please note that the laycan remains 15th to 20th November. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Buenos Aires on 15th November, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
John Doe
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - Buenos Aires to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
